During the term, and subject to Clientâ€™s compliance with the provisions of the Agreement, Provider authorizes Client to provide the eLearning Courses to Authorized Participants using a secure learning management system (LMS) that Client provides and manages. 2. Provider will maintain the applicable eLearning Courses for Client, making updates available as they occur, providing tech support to Client admins, and providing limited end-user support for questions emailed to training@linuxfoundation.org.
